greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=1; a(n+1) = 1 + f(a(n))^2, where f(x) is the largest prime factor of x (A006530).
comment: Essentially the same as A031439; a(n) = A031439(n-1)^2 + 1. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 08 2009
maple: with(numtheory): a[0]:=1: a[1]:=2: for n from 2 to 20 do b:=factorset(a[n-1]): a[n]:=1+op(nops(b),b)^2: od: seq(a[n],n=0..20); # _Emeric Deutsch_, Feb 05 2006
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 08 2002
ext: a(16) corrected by _T. D. Noe_, Nov 26 2007
